revision.text: ==Classical Nahuatl== ===Etymology=== From {{compound|nci|xoconōchtli|nohpalli|t1=sour prickly pear|t2=nopal; cactus}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|nci|[ʃókonóːt͡ʃ.noʔˈpálːi]}} ===Noun=== {{head|head=xoconōchnohpalli|nci|noun|g=in|plural|xoconōchnohpalli}} # {{gloss|it is}} a type of [[fruit-bearing]] [[cactus]], a [[cholla]]; ''[[species:Cylindropuntia imbricata|Cylindropuntia imbricata]]''. ====Synonyms==== * {{l|nci|tenohpalli}} [[Category:nci:Plants]]
